Detailed Description

Class to hold the required context for a request and its expected reply message.

Member Function Documentation

void Mercury::Request::handleFailure ( Reason  reason  ) 

This method handles failure of the request.

This may be caused by failure of the channel or the request timing out.

void Mercury::Request::handleTimeout ( TimerHandle  handle,
void *  arg 
) [virtual]

This method handles timeouts for user requests.

It informs the handler of this failure case.

Implements TimerHandler.
